snippet.title: Great Gameboy Games - Cool Ball
snippet.description:
Another Takara game, we all know how this'll turn out... AWESOME! Cool Ball is a fun platformer, where you must bounce through each level, collecting items, such as keys and hammers to get through obstacles and open doors. After item is collected the exit opens up, and you go to the next level. If you have any questions, leave a comment or PM me. Enjoy!
-----------------------------------------------------------------
COOL BALL AND THE MUSIC BELONGS TO TAKARA AND SWEAR BY THIS.
